Introduction
This topic provides an overview of the SMTS Portal, including
purpose of the SMTS Portal
functions of the SMTS Portal
, and
authorization to use the SMTS Portal for claims processing
.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Veterans Claims Intake Program (VCIP) Shipping
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
